name: @nexray/api
description: Official NexRay API Client Library for Node.js

scripts.build: npm run build:cjs && npm run build:esm
scripts.build:cjs: cp src/cjs.js lib/ && cp config.json lib/ && cp engine-requirements.js lib/engine-requirements.js
scripts.build:esm: babel src/esm.js -o lib/esm.js --presets=@babel/preset-env && cp config.json lib/config.json
scripts.test: node -e "const nexray = require('./index.js'); console.log('âœ… Package loaded successfully')"

author: NexRay
